system.summary: Search the local area for any medicinal herbs that grow here.

description.value:
As a Rest Action, you can attempt to find herbs in a biome. Roll an Intelligence (Nature) check. Based on the result and environment, you find different results. If you get a high roll, you can choose to find a more common herb instead.
Certain biomes are harder to find herbs in. Those biomes have DC modifiers listed next to their names on the @Compendium[undertaking.tables.5R8FKYXDXRVWMOQD]{Ingredients - Herbs} table.
